document_data.name: Addas Babar
document_data.mainbody: '''Addas Babar''' was a sprawling settlement in [[Anauroch]] that was home to many of the desert's [[D'tarig]] people. The town was a spacious camping grounds for those travelers who dared to cross the great desert of [[north Faerûn|northern Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: The town comprised mud and wood structures, mostly built for living accommodations, scattered across a handful of peaks and troughs of hilly landscape. Due to designation as the premiere trading post of the D'tarig, Addas Babar held a spacious marketplace, where outlanders could resupply and hire local experts and guides.
document_data.Geography: It was located in a hilly range just beyond the northern slopes of the [[Tethyamar Mountains]].
document_data.Trade: In addition to local shopkeepers, Addas Babar attracted all manner of foreign merchants who peddled their wares on nearly every street in town.
